1.10.2.1.6.4-beta1: Fixed uncrafting message not clearing when shift-clicking from output grid

1.10.2.1.6.2: Fixed compatibility issue with tinker's construct
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre12: Leather strips and rabbit hide, unenchanting now costs XP, more config options
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre11: Added ability to uncraft fireworks and tipped arrows
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre10: Applied Energistics support, Thermal Expansion support, CraftTweaker bug fix, Chinese translation
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre9: Fixed bug with excluded items config
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre8: Various bug fixes, improved mod support
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre7: Added network message to sync config when player joins server
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre6: Fixed dupe glitch, fixed shift click into wrong slot
1.10.2.1.6.1-pre2: New version with lots of new features!
